Emergency Preparedness, Response & Recovery

Our final section will cover Emergency Preparedness, Response, and Recovery.

Emergencies can occur in every community. And when they do, they can be devastating to Child Care Programs. This chapter will review the steps you need to take before, during and after an emergency. These actions will minimize the effects of a disaster and save lives for the children you are entrusted with.

Family and Group Homes and Centers are all required under LARA to develop plans, procedures, and practices to address emergencies as we will discuss as we go through this chapter.
